name: orbi1r
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(w0, w1))
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wo(w2, w0), wo(w2, w1)))

comment: ~ orbi1 with order of disjuncts reversed. Derived from ~ orbi1rVD . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 31-Dec-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
